lines.dialogue: ...Has the party begun yet?...
Hey, Emma. Have you heard that Spring Carnival will be next week?
lines.name: Kevin

lines.dialogue: Oh yeah. I know that and I'm super curious about which Buggy team will win the race this year!
lines.name: Emma

lines.dialogue: Haha, me too! I am also very interested in the Mobot Competition. There must be so many well-designed robots over there.
lines.name: Kevin

lines.dialogue: Hi Kevin, Emma. Are you guys talking about Spring Carnival?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah, Meimei. We haven't seen you for a long time.
lines.name: Kevin

lines.dialogue: Right, don't you usually spend most of your evenings studying in the library?
lines.name: Emma

lines.dialogue: Oh, sorry. My bad....
lines.name: Emma

lines.dialogue: Never mind. By the way, I am also very looking forward to the upcoming Spring Carnival.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Really? But I remember not too many international students willing to join Carnival last year.
lines.name: Kevin

lines.dialogue: Well, here I come! And I believe many of my friends have the same excitement about Carnival as me.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Wow. That's good!
lines.name: Kevin

lines.dialogue: By the way, are they doing karaoke now?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Right, Tiara is singing now.
lines.name: Emma

lines.dialogue: Yeah, it's usually a great way for us to relax and get closer to each other during the party.
lines.name: Kevin

lines.dialogue: Cool...
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Emma, Kevin. Would you like to join karaoke with us?
lines.name: Tiara

lines.dialogue: Sure. Please wait for me to pick a song for us!
lines.name: Emma

lines.dialogue: Hi Meimei. Welcome to the party! Would you mind waiting for us?
lines.name: Tiara

lines.dialogue: We'll be right back after we finish the karaoke.
lines.name: Kevin

lines.dialogue: OK... Have fun....
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: ...Actually, I could have a try...
Hey, Meimei. Welcome to the party! Did you have any friends come with you?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Hi Frank. Actually, Grace told me that there would be a party here, but I am not sure when she'll arrive.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Nice. I just saw that you were talking with Kevin and Emma, right? Is everything going OK?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Yeah. They are very nice people. We had a great talk about the Spring Carnival.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Good to hear that! Oh, they are doing karaoke now. Do you want to watch them with me?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: OK... Enjoy the party!
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: ...Maybe, I'm just not ready for that...
...Is that Grace? She is one of my best friends...
Hey Meimei, what's going on?
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Hi Grace. I just... I feel like I do not belong here.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Do they get confused about what you're talking about again?
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: It's not like that....
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Is there anything wrong between you and these people here?
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Probably, they thought I am not an outgoing person willing to sing along with them....
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Come on Meimei! Don't worry about that.
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Well.. It just feels like everyone is surprised that I came to the party and the Spring Carnival...
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Actually, it happened to me several times before. They just don't get us.
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Really? Have you experienced the same situation as me before?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah, of course. Some of them are thinking Asian people are quiet until they get to know us.
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Probably, it is from some TV shows and movies which stereotype all Asian people as geeks.
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: So based on their understanding, Asian people are less talkative who only enjoy studying by themselves, right?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Exactly. That's why maybe Kevin and Emma just wanted to give you some space.
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Oh, I got it.... Although it's indeed a racial stereotype of Asian people, I think we can overcome it if we try.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: That's right! As long as we all work on it together, it's not a big deal for us.
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: That makes me feel much better now. Thanks, Grace!
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: No worry! So let's join the karaoke with them?
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: For sure. Let's sing the next one together!
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah, maybe try to share some of our traditional food or dessert with them?
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: That's a good idea! Remember the boba tea store we tried last time? We could let them have a try.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Wow, I remember the taro milk tea tasted so good! They are going to love it!
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: By the way, a new noodle bar just opened last week very close to us.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: I know that one! I heard the beef noodle soup is really good.
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Nice! Let's try that together next time!
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Sounds great! So why don't we grab something to eat and join the karaoke?
lines.name: Grace

lines.dialogue: Yeah, let's enjoy the party with everyone else!
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Hey guys! Do you guys mind if we sing the next one together?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Hey Meimei, Grace! We're waiting for you guys.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Let's enjoy the music!
lines.name: Meimei
